nodes.text: BG-J38 was a bug-headed, yellow-plated J9 worker drone who served in the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure's criminal empire. Within Jabba's Palace, the droid was stationed near the entrance to the throne room.

BG-J38 first appeared in the 1983 original trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. The character was identified in canon in 2020 by the Star Wars: Card Trader app. BG-J38 was created as a puppet with limited articulation.
